name: He Protecc but also Atacc
description:
Protect your owners and get a highscore!

THIS GAME CAN BE LAGGY IN THE BROWSER ON SLOWER HARDWARE.
Try our Windows/Linux build instead then ;)

Movement: 
  • WASD
  • LMB -> attack
  • TAB -> open buy menu
